Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. It's not just an item; it's an experience designed to elevate your daily routine. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all its benefits, I kindly propose a price of $200 for this product. I hope you find it appealing and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
